entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Allow `DefaultValueAttribute` with primitives when `System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute.IsSupported` disabled #103542
  • NuGet FatalProtocolException in LibraryImportGenerator tests #103541
  • When calculating with xxhash128, it is slower. #103539
  • NegotiateAuthentication - Provide method to get error messages #103536
  • static Resize method in the System. Array.cs creates a new array instance even if the new size is 0. #103535
  • XDocument.Load fails with certain Unicode characters (U+E039) #103532
  • CI test failure: CryptographicException : Error occurred during a cryptographic operation. #103531
  • BinaryFormatterTests.ValidateAgainstBlobs test failure #103530

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Span.StartsWith/EndsWith(T) #87689
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Add Gauge Metrics Instrument #103543
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 9.0.0
  • Allow GC on the first instruction of NoGC region (except in prologs/epilogs) #103540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Make stack size computation in `fgCanFastTailCall` more precise #103538
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Use new ABI classifiers for `GenTreeCall` arguments #103537
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable generic function pointer tests on mono #103534
    area-Interop-mono, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 126.0.6478.61, windows: 126.0.6478.62 #103529
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

Merged

  • Add Span.StartsWith(T) and EndsWith(T) #103458
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Enable FEATURE_ARRAYSTUB_AS_IL on all platforms #103533
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Intrinsify typeof(T).IsGenericType #99555
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Move type check of MD array to managed #103414
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete some unused cmake defines #103441
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution

Updated

  • Intrinsify typeof(T).GetGenericTypeDefinition() #103528
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Optimize out write barriers for fields in ref-like structs #103503
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • CI test #99871
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update docs for ByRefLike with generics and add run-time check #103318
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2475087 #103348
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • [wasm] emscripten bump 3.1.56 #100334
    area-Build-mono
  • Additional cleanup and acceleration of the System.Numerics vector and related types #103527
    area-System.Numerics
  • Move the working BinaryFormatter implementation to a NuGet package #103255
    area-System.Runtime, binary-serialization, 9.0.0
  • [TEST] noop change to see if tests are passing #85694
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • fix null check to unblock sdk #103523
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • [HTTP/3] Wrap Cancelled Request with OCE instead of QuicException #103081
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Delete `GT_CNS_LNG` #85951
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Support overriding MsQuic.dll in the application directory on Windows. #103351
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Update EOL versions (main) #103379
    area-Infrastructure
  • Cleanup some handling around Avx10v1 #103241
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Stack allocate unescaped boxes #103361
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Expose the useful constant values in TimeSpan #103498
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, area-System.DateTime, 9.0.0
  • Implement `ShuffleUnsafe` methods #99596
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, tenet-performance, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Enable building .dll if both 'CustomNativeMain' and 'NativeLib' are set #103504
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add missing includes for FreeBSD 14 in pal_networkstatistics.c #103187
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
